20110116011737.000|20110116011739.000|CC1| IF YOU ARE TAKING AZATHIOPRINE,
20110116011739.000|20110116011739.000|CC1|         MERCAPTOPURINE,        
20110116011739.000|20110116011740.000|CC1|         OR THEOPHYLLINE.       
20110116011740.000|20110116011740.000|CC1|          GOUT MAY FLARE        
20110116011740.000|20110116011742.000|CC1|      WHEN STARTING ULORIC.     
20110116011742.000|20110116011743.000|CC1|      DON'T STOP TAKING IT.     
20110116011743.000|20110116011743.000|CC1|     YOUR DOCTOR MAY GIVE YOU   
20110116011743.000|20110116011745.000|CC1|         OTHER MEDICINES        
20110116011745.000|20110116011747.000|CC1|     TO HELP PREVENT FLARES.    
20110116011747.000|20110116011747.000|CC1|          A SMALL NUMBER        
20110116011747.000|20110116011748.000|CC1|    OF HEART ATTACKS, STROKES,  
20110116011748.000|20110116011748.000|CC1|     AND HEART-RELATED DEATHS   
20110116011748.000|20110116011750.000|CC1|      WERE SEEN IN STUDIES.     
20110116011750.000|20110116011750.000|CC1|         IT'S NOT CERTAIN       
20110116011750.000|20110116011752.000|CC1|       ULORIC CAUSED THEM.      
20110116011752.000|20110116011752.000|CC1|   CERTAIN TESTS TO CHECK LIVER 
20110116011752.000|20110116011755.000|CC1|    FUNCTION MAY BE REQUIRED.   
20110116011755.000|20110116011755.000|CC1|      TELL YOUR DOCTOR ABOUT    
20110116011755.000|20110116011757.000|CC1|    LIVER OR KIDNEY PROBLEMS,   
20110116011757.000|20110116011757.000|CC1|   OR HISTORY OF HEART DISEASE
